title: Red Dead Redemption 2
headline: Red Dead Redemption 2
subtitle: Get Bonus GTA$ for Digital Pre-Orders
content:
All pre-orders of Red Dead Redemption 2 also include the War Horse and the Outlaw Survival Kit for Red Dead Redemption 2 Story Mode. Plus digital pre-orders receive added rewards, including bonus GTA$ to spend immediately in Grand Theft Auto Online.

Check out the Rockstar Newswire for all the details and further info on the exclusive Red Dead Redemption 2 Story Mode content included in the Special Edition and bonus online content in the Ultimate Edition.
